welcome_message_body: Welcome to Eastbourne, a charming coastal town known for its stunning beaches, Victorian architecture, and beautiful gardens. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this picturesque town has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves domestic and international flights, offering a range of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
